body_html:
ResourceExhaustedError (see above for traceback): OOM when allocating tensor with shape[1,5095,3729,3]

This just means that you don't have enough GPU memory for your setting.
you may try to reduce the size of the model.

body:
ResourceExhaustedError (see above for traceback): OOM when allocating tensor with shape[1,5095,3729,3]

This just means that you don't have enough GPU memory for your setting.
you may try to reduce the size of the model.
